oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Accordion postcard packet of scenes at Fort Oglethorpe and Chickamauga Park
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Color postcards showing scenes near Chattanooga. 1: Army cantonment camp; 2: Battalion Drill; 3: Post Exchange Theatre and Artillery Barracks; 4:View in Camp Greenleaf; 5: A Scene at Fort Oglethorpe; 6: :Ofiicers Front and Cente"; 7: Artillery Instruction 8: Physical Drill; 9: Soldiers on the march. Verso: camp scenes including Bird's eye view of Fort Oglethorpe, mess and sleeping quarters. Fort Oglethorpe was located on the Civil War battlefield of Chickamauga and was a major WWI US Army installation.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: World war, 1914-1918; World war, 1914-1918 - History
